column1: Bruinen or Loudwater was a river in eastern Eriador.  It began with two tributaries flowing from the western slopes of the Misty Mountains
column2: one of which came from the High Pass where Goblin-town existed.  The Bruinen terminated when it joined the Mitheithel River.  The southern arm of the Bruinen flowed through the deep valley where Elrond founded the refuge of Rivendell. The Bruinen had only one known ford
column3: the Ford of Bruinen near Rivendell.

column1: The river formed the eastern border of the Kingdom of Arnor and later the petty-realm of Rhudaur.  It also formed the northern border of Eregion.
